scripts.watch-s: pulp --watch run -o output/Server --src-path src/Server --include src/Shared --main Server.Main
scripts.watch-l: pulp --watch browserify -o output/Client/landing --src-path src/Client/Landing --main Client.Landing.Main --include src/Shared:src/Client/Common --to src/Client/javascript/landing.bundle.js --standalone Landing
scripts.watch-li: pulp --watch browserify -o output/Client/Login --src-path src/Client/Login --main Client.Login.Main --include src/Shared:src/Client/Common --to src/Client/javascript/login.bundle.js
scripts.watch-im: pulp --watch browserify -o output/Client/IM --src-path src/Client/IM --main Client.IM.Main --include src/Shared:src/Client/Common --to src/Client/javascript/im.bundle.js
scripts.watch-pf: pulp --watch browserify -o output/Client/Profile --src-path src/Client/Profile --main Client.Profile.Main --include src/Shared:src/Client/Common --to src/Client/javascript/profile.bundle.js
scripts.watch-st: pulp --watch browserify -o output/Client/Settings --src-path src/Client/Settings --main Client.Settings.Main --include src/Shared:src/Client/Common --to src/Client/javascript/settings.bundle.js
scripts.watch-r: pulp --watch browserify -o output/Client/recover --src-path src/Client/Recover --main Client.Recover.Main --include src/Shared:src/Client/Common --to src/Client/javascript/recover.bundle.js --standalone Recover
scripts.watch-c: npm run watch-l & npm run watch-li & npm run watch-im
scripts.watch-sim: npm run watch-s & npm run watch-im
scripts.watch-spf: npm run watch-s & npm run watch-pf
scripts.watch-sst: npm run watch-s & npm run watch-st
scripts.watch-sl: npm run watch-s & npm run watch-l
scripts.watch-sli: npm run watch-s & npm run watch-li
scripts.watch-sr: npm run watch-s & npm run watch-r
scripts.watch: npm run watch-s & npm run watch-c
scripts.deploy-server: pulp build --src-path src/Server --include src/Shared --main Server.Main --optimise --to server.js
scripts.deploy: npm install && bower install --force && npm run deploy-server
